programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E01, Halloween in a small town is canceled indefinitely when a young girl is kidnapped and killed on her way home from a costume party.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E19, After U.S. Navy sailor disappears in 68, the Navy claims he went AWOL. But his sister works for over 30 years to prove that he was really killed. And DNA from a cigarette butt helps detectives to unravel a 20-year-old case of rape and murder.

MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man, 19950318000000 +0000, During the feature film The Amazing Transparent Man (1960), a mad scientist makes an escaped criminal invisible so he can steal radioactive supplies.
MST3K: The Atomic Brain, 19931204000000 +0000, A rich, elderly woman wants her doctor to transplant her brain into the body of one of her young captives.

MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats, 19950121000000 +0000, After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?

MST3K: The Beatniks, 19921125000000 +0000, When a hold-up carried out by his two-bit hoodlum friends goes tragically awry, Eddie Craneâ€™s bright future as a recording artist from the mean streets could be in jeopardy.
MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die, 19931030000000 +0000, New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: What About Juvenile Delinquency?
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E07, A band of no-good punks beat a guy for driving too slow and steal his mechanical pencil, before arriving to pick up their missing member Jamie, the son of the man they've just beaten.

MST3K: Master Ninja I, 19920111000000 +0000, The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.
MST3K: Master Ninja II, 19920125000000 +0000, Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.
Best Christmas Party Ever, 20141213000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A young party planner arranges a Christmas party for a New York toy store.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

A Family Reunion, 20130629000000 +0000, In their youth, the Banner siblings made it big as a rock group, but at the height of their fame, the group fell apart. Now, fifteen years later the siblings reunite in their hometown to take care of their mother.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

A Place for Annie, 19940501000000 +0000, Sissy Spacek stars as a caring nurse who adopts an HIV positive baby but must fight prejudice and the natural mother who wants custody. Also stars Mary-Louise Parker and Joan Plowright. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

Anne Tyler's Saint Maybe, 19981231000000 +0000, The story of a young man seeking forgiveness for his brother's death. Stars Mary Louise Parker and Blythe Danner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Blind Spot, 19930502000000 +0000, A woman running for the Senate is jolted by a family tragedy which threatens to become a career ending scandal. Stars Joanne Woodward and Laura Linney. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Origin
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E03, Daniel and Vala learn that their reactivation of an ancient communications device has inadvertently exposed Earth to the wrath of the group of unforgiving deities called Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Ties That Bind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E04, Daniel Jackson and Vala embark on a series of dangerous missions in their quest to unlock the frustrating Jaffa bracelets that seems to have bound them together for eternity. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E09, Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: The Powers That Be
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E05, When Daniel and Vala attempt to undo the teachings of the Ori on a distant planet, they and the planet's inhabitants find themselves subject to their foe's vengeful wrath. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E06, The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ex Deus Machina
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E07, The SG-1 team must intervene when a major ongoing conflict between the strident Jaffa Gerak and their former enemy Ba'al puts the entire United States at risk of destruction. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Budget Cuts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E02, After learning that the clinic may lose funding, Kelly asks Brandon to write a story to generate publicity. David believes that Valerie killed her father in self-defense and should move on.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E04, Carl decides to annul his marriage to Abby because he believes that he has a future with Valerie. Kelly notices that a store is for lease and decides that she and Donna should open a boutique.

programme.title: Brandon Leaves
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E05, Brandon announces that he has accepted a job with the Washington bureau of the New York Chronicle. Kelly and Donna prepare to open their store, Now Wear This. Valerie seeks legal advice from Matt.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E08, David is arrested for statutory rape and gets suspended from his radio show. Steve bristles at the news that his mother is dating her much younger co-star. Kelly's reaction to Dylan's return worries Matt.

programme.title: The Following Options
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E09, Kelly grows angry with Matt when he takes a case defending a tobacco company. Donna agrees to let a troubled fifteen-year-old girl buy a dress on layaway. Dylan takes his bullet-riddled Porsche out of storage.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.title: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E12, Dissatisfied customers take Steve to court, and wind up on TV; Gina continues to care for Dylan, who is arrested; Donna and Noah struggle to find a place to be alone; David has to back up his lie to Gertrude; Kelly second-guesses herself with Matt.

programme.title: Beheading St. Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E15, Lauren moves into the Walsh house; Steve's idea for his paper leads to an alert about a potential health problem; Donna agrees to pose as David's girlfriend at a business function; Gina worries she can't keep pace with Dylan.

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: Sis Burn Car/Children’s Doc
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E115, Mom caught in burning car / Visiting children's national medical center in DC

programme.title: White Eagle/Ando the Dog
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E128, Vicki White Eagle has a car accident and becomes impaled by a piece of fence/A hit and run accident escalates.

programme.title: Boomer’s Rescue/It’s a Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E255, Police and firefighters search through a burning house to rescue a puppy. A pregnant women goes into labor home alone

programme.title: Hidden Phone/Swamp
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E190, A man is shot by a burglar when he returns to his home. A Truck driver is thrown through the windshield into an alligator-infested swamp.

programme.title: Rifle/De-fib Phone
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E171, A youngster saves his sister after an accidental shooting. A woman waiting for a heart transplant has a heart attack.

programme.title: Pacoima Cliff/American River
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E104, Cliff climber loses footing/gold prospector gets pinned down underwater

programme.title: Shaft Toddler/Police Quagmire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E277, A twenty-two-month-old falls into a 12-feet deep hole. Baltimore police get stuck in a swap after chasing auto-theft suspects.

programme.title: Avalanche Friend/Marble
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E253, A young man suddenly swept down a slope by an avalanche breaks his leg when he hits a pine tree. A two-year-old boy chokes on a marble.

programme.title: Bridal Veil/Bath Trapped Mommy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E358, A man hiking slips and falls 300 feet over a cliff face. A 5-year old girl calls 911 when her mom is trapped in an unusual predicament.

programme.title: Aussie Whale/Sucker
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E258, A 30-ton whale beaches itself and needs help to get back into the ocean. A 2-year-old in an at-home babysitting service chokes on a lollipop.

programme.title: Yellow Cab/Runaway Dogsled
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E152, While preparing for a dogsled ride with a 3-year-old, the dogs got spooked and ran off with the child.

programme.title: Stabbing, Shooting/Fancy Dancer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E264, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Car Surfing Girl/Wrong Number
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E356, A 10-year old girl is riding on a car's hood when she's thrown off when the car stops. A 10-year old girl accidentally calls the wrong number and discovers a man who may be dying.

programme.title: Purgatory Chasm/Birth
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E269, A teen Russian immigrant falls into a 35 feet chasm. A woman goes into labor home alone with her first-grader.

programme.title: Train Track/Stinky’s Sewer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E315, A man helps a woman when her car is rear-ended at a railroad crossing. A puppy is trapped in a sewer drain.

programme.title: Fast Food Rob/Heart Attack Hubby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E272, A fast-food employee risks their life to call 911 during a robbery. A 911 dispatcher receives a call her husband is suffering a heart attack.

programme.title: Slush Puppy/Kapiolani Hospital
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E339, A Golden Retriever is caught in a freezing river current. A 9-year-old boy is injured when the all-terrain vehicle he's riding flips over.

programme.title: Australian Balloon/Dr.’s Hay Crush, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E311, A hot air balloon is swept 25 miles out to sea by high winds. A man is injured while trying to move a bail of hay with his tractor.

programme.title: New Orleans Docu, Part 2/Pick-up Thrown
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E382, New Orleans police search for an armed robber on New Year's Eve. A girl is injured while riding in the back of a pick-up truck.

programme.title: Lake Mead/Senior Sharpshooter
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E231, An inexperienced pilot encounters turbulence in an ultralight plane and is pinned against the side of a cliff. A 61-year-old woman is awoken by an intruder.

programme.title: Unwanted Intruder/Stranded Octos
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E233, A woman calls 911 while she hides from an intruder. An elderly couple is stranded on a boat for 2 days.

programme.title: Hypo Hang Glider/Arsonist
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E212, A hang-glider is plunged by high winds into the pacific. Houston 911 receives a series of taunting calls from an arsonist.

programme.title: Furnace Fire/Logger’s Lament

programme.title: 13 Yr Old Heimlich/Civil War

programme.title: Remarriage/Cop Saves Dog

programme.title: Next Generation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E02, Hobie, Lani, April, and Skylar are among the trainees competing for a few open slots as Baywatch Lifeguards. Hobie isn't sure he wants to follow in his father's footsteps, but when a vengeful jet skier comes after April, Hobie comes to her rescue.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E03, Veteran lifeguard Jack 'JD' Darius has a dark secret in his past. He comes to Baywatch to throw his rescue can in the ring for the open Lieutenant slot, but young and ambitious Taylor Walsh also wants the job, and she's ready to fight for it.

programme.title: Memorial Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E04, Mitch, Sky, and April find a dead man on the ocean floor. Their search for answers to his demise leads to the retirement home where he lived, and his two friends who seem to be hiding the true story. The chemistry between Cody and Lani heats up.

programme.title: Charlie
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E05, April is devastated by her younger brother Charlie’s terminal illness. Mitch and Hobie want to make sure Charlie's wishes are granted, and that the time he spends with the lifeguards at Baywatch is the best of his life.

programme.title: Lifeguard Confidential
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E06, Caroline's acting career isn't going well so she returns to Baywatch to figure out what she really wants to do with her life. The lifeguards are plagued by a sleaze-ball helicopter reporter who somehow knows intimate details about their love lives.

programme.title: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E07, After the devastation of the last big L.A. earthquake, Baywatch lifeguards are taking recent Seismic activity seriously. Caroline and JD 's tempestuous relationship heats up, forcing Caroline to make a critical decision that could change her life.

programme.title: El Niño
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E08, The hot Santa Ana winds blow an air of mystery to Baywatch when two sea lions perish in an unexplainable event. Mitch must uncover the cause to stop it from happening again. April is courted by Manny and Hobie, forcing her to choose between them.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E09, Donna tries to help Neely overcome her addiction to painkillers. Craig Pomeroy shows up at Baywatch to defend the legal rights of an elderly Native American shaman determined to initiate his tribe's traditional death ritual on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E10, Cody ignores regulations and leaves his tower five minutes early to meet Lani for a hot date. Right after he leaves, a young woman goes swimming and is engulfed by a wave, never to reappear. Cody is tortured by the results of his negligence.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E11, Caroline's truck is hijacked by a young thief who forces her to drive him on a wild getaway chase. Neely reveals a shocking secret about her outrageous actions during her hiatus from Baywatch.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E12, Prejudice threatens Manny and April's relationship, driving April into Craig's comforting arms. An encounter with sharks leads Craig and April to take shelter in a water treatment plant's intake pipe where they encounter even more danger!

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E13, Mitch learns that a cache of US Marine weapons has been stolen and probably hidden offshore. Mitch and Cody locate a sunken vessel with the arms on board, but before they can confiscate them, they are taken captive.

programme.title: Surf City
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E14, After breaking up with Manny, April finds romance with Craig, who is having a mid-life crisis. While working together to catch a trio of wild men on waverunners harassing swimmers, Craig and April's passion heats up.

programme.title: To the Max
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E15, Mitch uses Hobie to initiate a relationship with Hobie's horseback riding instructor. Cody, JD, and Lani try to make extra cash in a scheme to collect Sea Urchins, but when another diver gets into trouble, Lani puts her life at risk to save him.

programme.title: Night of the Dolphin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E16, Garner enlists Mitch’s help to track down and capture a ring of drug smugglers operating from a boat offshore. The stakes get deadly when Neely goes undercover to plant a bug and her cover is blown! Lani struggles to come to terms with her deafness.

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E17, Cody makes a crazy bet with some local hotshots. Mitch risks his uncle's new Scarab in a wild race. Meanwhile, Neely and her baby daughter Ashley move in with Mitch for a couple of days sparking a twist to their relationship.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E18, After a swimmer shows symptoms of a deadly virus, headquarters is quarantined, trapping Mitch, April, Donna, and JD inside with an annoying salesman. With JD waylaid, Newman takes on his plum assignment overseeing a photoshoot of sexy models.
